org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 ChannelRotater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.ChannelRotater

  • public class ChannelRotater
extends Object
    Maintains multiple channels and rotates between them. This is thread-safe.
